summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5654 for the improvement of Snoqualmie Street, from 10th Avenue South to 15th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 74687, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
